subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Martin Truex Jr. won his first pole at Atlanta Motor Speedway, qualifying first for Sunday night’s Pep Boys Auto 500 with a lap of 184.149 miles per hour.
snippet: Martin Truex Jr. won his first pole at Atlanta Motor Speedway, qualifying first for Sunday night’s Pep Boys Auto 500 with a lap of 184.149 miles per hour.
